discoverSub: Explore what's happening around you — concerts, meetups, workshops, and more.
seoPitch: Sự kiện ở Hà Nội • Hanoi events this week — concerts, meetups, workshops, nightlife, family activities and more curated on Suki.
seoPitch2: Khám phá hoạt động cuối tuần, vé và địa điểm hot quanh bạn.
event.cta.readMore: See description for how to join.
manage.title: Manage my events
manage.note.offsite: Ticketing handled off-site via your external link.
manage.empty: You haven't created any events yet.
eventForm.title: Event title
footer.faq.title: Frequently asked questions about Suki
footer.faq.bestEvents: What are the best events to attend?
footer.faq.bestEventsAnswer: Explore "Trending" or use filters for category, date, and location to find top picks.
footer.faq.nearMe: How do I find events near me?
footer.faq.nearMeAnswer: Open Discover or Browse, click the Location filter, and choose your city (e.g., Ha Noi). You can also pick "Current location" to use your device's GPS or "All locations" to see everything.
footer.faq.upcomingAnswer: Use the "Today" / "Weekend" time filters on the Discover or Browse page.
footer.email.title: Stay updated with weekly event digests
footer.email.subtitle: Get the best events in your city delivered to your inbox every Friday.
footer.suki.description: A discovery-first events directory for Vietnam.
footer.product.title: Product
footer.company.title: Company
footer.contact.title: Contact us
footer.contact.subtitle: Questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
create.title: Event title
create.titlePlaceholder: What's the name of your event?
create.ticketsDescription: Suki doesn't process payments. Add a link to your checkout (Ticketbox, 8theatre, VietQR, Momo, Google Form) and a short guide for attendees. This section is optional.
create.ticketInstructions:
Short instructions (optional). Example:
1) Click the link above
2) Choose seat & quantity
3) Pay via Momo/VietQR
4) Keep your confirmation email
create.ticketsOptional: If left blank, the event page won't show a Tickets section.
create.signInRequired: Please sign in to create events
create.dateRequired: Please select a date and start time
create.categoryRequired: Please select at least one category
create.venueRequired: Please enter a venue name or select "To be announced"
